Key Match Events: Son Heung-min headed in a second goal just before halftime
Son Heung-min assisted Jung Seung-hyun's header in the 87th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a sell-out crowd of more than 40,000 in Shenzhen
South Korea tops Group C with six points
China is third in the group, behind Thailand, who beat Singapore 3-1 on Monday, on goal difference
